items.title: Cognizant may have renewed $1B deal with UnitedHealth, Mint says
items.description: Cognizant’s (CTSH) president for the Americas region said while presenting at a fireside chat on Tuesday that the company had won a deal worth “approximately a billion dollars,” notes Mint’s Jas Bardia, who adds that Mint has learnt from people with knowledge of the matter that the statement indicates Cognizant might have renewed its partnership with UnitedHealth (UNH). Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. Try Now>> See the top sto

items.title: 2 Beaten-Down Dividend Stocks to Buy Now and Hold at Least a Decade
items.description: Whether they want rapid payout growth or a high yield that rises slowly, income focused investors can find what their looking for in the healthcare sector.  UnitedHealth Group stock has been offering a 3% yield, and it's payout has grown by leaps and bounds in recent years.  Pfizer offers a dividend yield over 7%, but it's payout probably won't rise very fast in the decade ahead.
